items.title: CESC to turbocharge growth with renewable energy, execution is the key
items.description: The company aims to double its profits in five years

items.title: Two to Tango: Tata Capital and LG IPOs to siphon liquidity, starving secondary markets
items.description: Domestic institutions have deployed about Rs 33,000 crore per week on average this year—two mega issues alone will absorb most of that

items.title: India weighs resolution of Vodafone Idea dues row to bolster UK ties
items.description: Resolution in the nearly Rs 2 trillion financial dispute may come through a waiver of interest and penalties, followed by a concession on the principal

items.title: FMCG Q2 FY26 Update: GST cut, urban demand revival to aid growth
items.description: Easing inflation, tax impetus to drive consumption growth

items.title: Tata Capital IPO is priced reasonably, but should investors subscribe to it?
items.description: The company is well-positioned to command a valuation premium, given its strong parentage and the market’s bias towards quality names in the financial services space

items.title: Rising loan defaults hit smartphone financing as brands push premium upgrades: Report
items.description: The default rates on mobile phone financing now range between 2.7% and 2.9%, higher than the expected 2%.

items.title: Centre proposes Rs 5,000 crore R&D booster for Pharma and MedTech: Can it drive innovation?
items.description: The initiative, backed by a total financial outlay of Rs 5,000 Crore (nearly $600 million) spanning from FY 2023-24 to FY 2029-30, is designed to shift the life sciences economy from a volume-driven, cost-based generic manufacturing hub to an innovation-centric global competitor.

items.title: Shringar House of Mangalsutra: Will the stock sparkle?
items.description: SHOML has most of the reputed jewellery chains as its customers and is targeting to increase the share of business with them.
